html:
wearied…greatness of thy way/saidst not…no hope. Lady Israel's quest after other gods is a wearisome one (Jer. 2:25; 18:12). But despite the greatness of the undertaking, Israel (like apostates in all ages) continued in her false search.

life of thine hand/not grieved. According to the Revised Standard Version, "You found new life for your strength, and so you were not faint." Though Israel's quest after other gods seemed hopeless, she redoubled her efforts and continued on. Some people today do the same thing—they continue to seek fulfillment in the wrong places even though the desired happiness does not come.
